document.discussion_title: PV Sindhu receives grand welcome post historic Olympic feat at Hyderabad Airport
document.topic_text: Following her successful feat at the Rio Olympics , silver medalist P.V. Sindhu arrived at the Rajiv Gandhi International Airport in Hyderabad today. »
document.post: Following her successful feat at the Rio Olympics , silver medalist P.V. Sindhu arrived at the Rajiv Gandhi International Airport in Hyderabad today. »
